languages.text: "Вот как". {n}Не более пары секунд Абеляр всматривается в ваше лицо, после чего отворачивается и всматривается в бледное измученное лицо Клеменции. Сенешаль силится что-то сказать — и только выдавливает из себя:{/n} "Молитва, Клеменциа. Не дай им увидеть тебя униженной".

traits.locale_text: "Вот как". {n}Не более пары секунд Абеляр всматривается в ваше лицо, после чего отворачивается.{/n} "Как будет угодно Лорд-капитану".
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "So this is how it is." {n}Abelard stares at you for a few moments, then turns away and looks at Clementia's pale, exhausted face. The Seneschal tries to say something but only manages to cough out:{/n} "Pray, Clementia. Do not let them see you demeaned."
languages.original_text: "Вот как". {n}Не более пары секунд Абеляр всматривается в ваше лицо, после чего отворачивается и всматривается в бледное измученное лицо Клеменции. Сенешаль силится что-то сказать — и только выдавливает из себя:{/n} "Молитва, Клеменциа. Не дай им увидеть тебя униженной".

traits.locale_text: "So this is how it is." {n}Abelard looks into your face for a few moments, then turns away and looks at Clementia's pale, exhausted face. The Seneschal tries to say something, — but only manages to cough out:{/n} "Pray, Clementia. Don't let them belittle you."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "So this is how it is." {n}Abelard looks into your face for a few moments, then turns away and looks at Clementia's pale, exhausted face. The Seneschal tries to say something, — but only manages to cough out:{/n} "Pray, Clementia. Don't let them belittle you."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "So this is how it is." {n}Abelard looks into your face for a few moments, then turns away and looks at Clementia's pale, exhausted face. The Seneschal tries to say something but only manages to cough out:{/n} "Pray, Clementia. Don't let them demean you."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "So this is how it is." {n}Abelard looks into your face for a few moments, then turns away and looks at Clementia's pale, exhausted face. The Seneschal tries to say something but only manages to cough out:{/n} "Pray, Clementia. Don't let them demean you."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "So this is how it is." {n}Abelard stares at you for a few moments, then turns away and looks at Clementia's pale, exhausted face. The Seneschal tries to say something but only manages to cough out:{/n} "Pray, Clementia. Do not let them see you demeaned."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "So this is how it is." {n}Abelard stares at you for a few moments, then turns away and looks at Clementia's pale, exhausted face. The Seneschal tries to say something but only manages to cough out:{/n} "Pray, Clementia. Do not let them see you demeaned."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「そういうことでしたら」{n}アベラルドはあなたの顔をしばらく見つめてから、視線を外してクレメンティアの憔悴した真っ白な顔に向ける。家令長は何かを言おうとしたが、どうにも咳払いしか出てこない。{/n}「祈りなさい、クレメンティア。己の品格を落としてはならぬ」
languages.original_text: "So this is how it is." {n}Abelard stares at you for a few moments, then turns away and looks at Clementia's pale, exhausted face. The Seneschal tries to say something but only manages to cough out:{/n} "Pray, Clementia. Do not let them see you demeaned."

traits.locale_text: 「そういうことでしたら」{n}アベラルドはあなたの顔をしばらく見つめてから、視線を外してクレメンティアの憔悴した真っ白な顔に向ける。家令長は何かを言おうとしたが、どうにも咳払いしか出てこない。{/n}「祈りなさい、クレメンティア。己の品格を落としてはならぬ」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “既然如此，就这样吧。”{n}阿贝拉德盯着看了一会儿，随后转过头，望着克莱门缇雅苍白疲惫的面容。他似乎想要说些什么，最终却只是咳嗽了几声。{/n}“祈祷吧，克莱门缇雅。不要让小人折辱你的尊严。”
languages.original_text: "So this is how it is." {n}Abelard stares at you for a few moments, then turns away and looks at Clementia's pale, exhausted face. The Seneschal tries to say something but only manages to cough out:{/n} "Pray, Clementia. Do not let them see you demeaned."

traits.locale_text: “原来如此。”{n}阿贝拉德盯着你看了好一会儿，然后转过头，望着克莱门缇雅苍白疲惫的面容。他似乎想要说些什么，最终却只是咳嗽了几声。{/n}“祈祷吧，克莱门缇雅。不要让小人折辱你的尊严。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « C'est donc là votre décision. » {n}Abélard vous dévisage un instant avant de se tourner vers une Clémentia livide. Il semble peiner à trouver ses mots et ne parvient finalement qu'à toussoter :{/n} « Courage, Clémentia. Ne leur donne pas de raison de t'humilier davantage. »
languages.original_text: "So this is how it is." {n}Abelard stares at you for a few moments, then turns away and looks at Clementia's pale, exhausted face. The Seneschal tries to say something but only manages to cough out:{/n} "Pray, Clementia. Do not let them see you demeaned."

traits.locale_text: « C'est donc là votre décision. » {n}Abélard vous dévisage un instant avant de se tourner vers une Clémentia livide. Il semble peiner à trouver ses mots et ne parvient finalement qu'à toussoter :{/n} « Courage, Clémentia. Ne leur donne pas de raison de t'humilier davantage. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Así están las cosas». {n}Abelard te mira para luego dirigir la mirada a Clementia, que luce pálida y agotada. El Senescal intenta decir algo, pero lo único que sale de su boca es:{/n} «Vamos, Clementia. No dejes que te vean afectada».
languages.original_text: "So this is how it is." {n}Abelard stares at you for a few moments, then turns away and looks at Clementia's pale, exhausted face. The Seneschal tries to say something but only manages to cough out:{/n} "Pray, Clementia. Do not let them see you demeaned."

traits.locale_text: «Así están las cosas». {n}Abelard te mira para luego dirigir la mirada a Clementia, que luce pálida y agotada. El senescal intenta decir algo pero lo único que sale de su boca es:{/n} «Vamos, Clementia. No dejes que te menosprecien».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "So ist es also." {n}Abelard starrt dich einige Augenblicke lang an, dann wendet er sich ab und sieht in Clementias blasses, erschöpftes Gesicht. Der Truchsess versucht, etwas zu sagen, hustet jedoch nur halb:{/n} "Bitte, Clementia. Sie dürfen nicht sehen, wie Ihr erniedrigt werdet."
languages.original_text: "So this is how it is." {n}Abelard stares at you for a few moments, then turns away and looks at Clementia's pale, exhausted face. The Seneschal tries to say something but only manages to cough out:{/n} "Pray, Clementia. Do not let them see you demeaned."

traits.locale_text: "So ist es also." {n}Abelard starrt dich einige Augenblicke lang an, dann wendet er sich ab und sieht in Clementias blasses, erschöpftes Gesicht. Der Truchsess versucht, etwas zu sagen, hustet jedoch nur halb:{/n} "Bitte, Clementia. Lasst Euch nicht von ihnen erniedrigen."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Demek böyle olacaktı." {n}Abelard, bir müddet sana baktıktan sonra gözlerini Clementia'nın yorgun ve solgun yüzüne çeviriyor. Seneşal, bir şeyler söylemeye çalışsa da ancak gevelemekle yetiniyor.{/n} "Dua et Clementia. Kendini zayıf gösterme."
languages.original_text: "So this is how it is." {n}Abelard stares at you for a few moments, then turns away and looks at Clementia's pale, exhausted face. The Seneschal tries to say something but only manages to cough out:{/n} "Pray, Clementia. Do not let them see you demeaned."

traits.locale_text: "Demek böyle olacaktı." {n}Abelard bir müddet sana baktıktan sonra gözlerini Clementia'nın yorgun ve solgun yüzüne çeviriyor. Seneşal bir şeyler söylemeye çalışsa da ancak şunları geveliyor:{/n} "Dua et Clementia. Zayıf gösterme kendini."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
